data.name: Cleo - a pirate's tale - Deluxe Content
data.detailed_description:
The "Deluxe Content" for the game "Cleo - a pirate's tale" contains:
  • The original soundtrack to the game as WAV and MP3 with 18 tracks including credits song "Under Water".
  • 4K and HD wallpaper
  • High resolution character images
  • Knot-So-Fast code wheel printable template (PDF and PNG)
  • All Kraken Fodder cards (PDF and PNG)
  • PrintUrCocktHAL to craft your own CocktHAL8000 paper figure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX or higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia 460 Series / AMD 75XX or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX or higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia 460 Series / AMD 75XX or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
